item.title: AIOT Intelligent Trash Can
item.description:
• Intelligent Trash classification based on image
  • IoT device and platform integration with edge computing
  • Trashcan mechanical design and control by R-Pi

item.title: Cantilever beam to generate electricity
item.description:
• Utilize mechanics and physics property of piezoelectricity material to generate energy
  • Finite element analysis by Abaqus and resonance frequency design

item.title: Intelligent Healthcare Mobile Robot
item.description:
• Using laser simultaneous localization and mapping(SLAM) algorithm
  • Integration with computer vision to identify human
  • AWS EC2 cloud management and website design

item.title: Cast Search by Portrait Challengeassa
item.description:
• Proposed a deep learning-based model to re-identity people in IMDB dataset
  • Using a re-ranking mechanism and face crop model to achieve better performance
  • Visualize high dimension feature with t-SNE
